title: Square Meals
description: A culinary collaborative with a conscience, proudly serving New York City's finest organizations
richtext:
Square Meals is an eco-conscious catering company based out of Brooklyn, NY. Its brand promise is to focus on all natural ingredients, for daily-prepared meals, at a fair price. The new brand builds off of these principals through a nature-based palette, ingredient-focused iconography, and messaging that reflects the integrity of the business.
